text.title: Edinburgh's 'Million Mask March' flies distinctly Scottish colours

text:
Edinburgh's 'Million Mask March' flies distinctly Scottish colours
Friday, November 7, 2014
Amongst other Guy Fawkes Night partying, the now-regular march to the Scottish Parliament by Anonymous saw significantly higher attendance, Wednesday, at this year's event. With Catalan flags and pro-Independence Saltires flying, activist numbers had clearly been swelled by the referendum result.
